import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import plotly.graph_objects as go
import plotly.express as px

# Set up formatting

pd.options.display.float_format = '{:,.0f}'.format

# Comprehensive economic impact data - 3-Tier Structure for Gates Foundation

economic_impacts = pd.DataFrame({
    'Source': [
        '1% Treaty Peace Dividend',
        'dFDA R&D Savings Only (82x cost reduction)',
        'dFDA Conservative Floor (Historical Progress)',
        'dFDA PRIMARY (Disease Eradication Delay)',
        'dFDA Optimistic (Acceleration Effects)',
        'Medical Research Acceleration (115x capacity)',
        'Combined Conservative (Peace + R&D + Floor)',
        'Combined Complete (PRIMARY Benefits)'
    ],
    'Annual Value (Billions)': [
        float(PEACE_DIVIDEND_ANNUAL_SOCIETAL_BENEFIT) / 1_000_000_000,
        float(DFDA_BENEFIT_RD_ONLY_ANNUAL) / 1_000_000_000,
        float(DFDA_BENEFIT_HISTORICAL_PROGRESS_ANNUAL) / 1_000_000_000,
        float(DFDA_BENEFIT_DISEASE_ERADICATION_DELAY_ANNUAL) / 1_000_000_000,
        float(DFDA_BENEFIT_ACCELERATION_ANNUAL) / 1_000_000_000,
        float(BENEFIT_MEDICAL_RESEARCH_ACCELERATION_ANNUAL) / 1_000_000_000,
        (float(PEACE_DIVIDEND_ANNUAL_SOCIETAL_BENEFIT) + float(DFDA_BENEFIT_RD_ONLY_ANNUAL) + float(DFDA_BENEFIT_HISTORICAL_PROGRESS_ANNUAL)) / 1_000_000_000,
        float(TREATY_TOTAL_COMPLETE_BENEFITS_ANNUAL) / 1_000_000_000
    ],
    'ROI Ratio': [
        np.nan,
        np.nan,
        np.nan,
        np.nan,
        np.nan,
        np.nan,
        float(DFDA_ROI_RD_ONLY),
        float(TREATY_COMPLETE_ROI_ALL_BENEFITS)
    ],
    'Implementation Cost (Millions)': [
        500,  # Estimated for visualization
        float(DFDA_ANNUAL_OPEX) / 1_000_000,
        float(DFDA_ANNUAL_OPEX) / 1_000_000,
        float(DFDA_ANNUAL_OPEX) / 1_000_000,
        float(DFDA_ANNUAL_OPEX) / 1_000_000,
        100,  # Estimated for visualization
        float(TREATY_TOTAL_ANNUAL_COSTS) / 1_000_000,
        float(TREATY_CAMPAIGN_TOTAL_COST) / 1_000_000
    ]
})

# Calculate ROI where missing

mask = economic_impacts['ROI Ratio'].isna()
economic_impacts.loc[mask, 'ROI Ratio'] = (
    economic_impacts.loc[mask, 'Annual Value (Billions)'] * 1000 /
    economic_impacts.loc[mask, 'Implementation Cost (Millions)']
).round(0)

# Filter for items with ROI ratios

roi_data = economic_impacts[economic_impacts['ROI Ratio'].notna()].sort_values('ROI Ratio')

# Create logarithmic bar chart

fig = go.Figure()

colors = px.colors.sequential.Viridis_r
fig.add_trace(go.Bar(
    y=roi_data['Source'],
    x=roi_data['ROI Ratio'],
    orientation='h',
    marker=dict(
        color=roi_data['ROI Ratio'],
        colorscale='Viridis',
        showscale=True,
        colorbar=dict(title='ROI Ratio')
    ),
    text=[f'{int(x)}:1' for x in roi_data['ROI Ratio']],
    textposition='outside'
))

fig.update_layout(
    title='Return on Investment Comparison (Log Scale)',
    xaxis_title='ROI Ratio',
    yaxis_title='',
    xaxis_type='log',
    height=600,
    margin=dict(l=200, r=100)
)

fig.show()
